comment.text: This translation key is used to display the text "Don't show again" which is a label on a checkbox in a dialog box, indicating that the user has chosen not to be prompted about this option again. The text appears on a button and checkbox within a modal dialog component in a PDF form creation interface.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "Bir daha göstərməyin" is a rather formal and direct translation. A more natural and user-friendly translation would be something like "Xilas et" or "Daha göstərmə" which convey the intended meaning in a more conversational tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Xilas et" or "Daha göstərmə".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "再表示しない" (saishouhi shinai) is a valid Japanese phrase, it literally translates to "do not show again" or "do not display again." It's not as natural a translation of "Don't show again" as other options. A more natural translation would be "もう表示しない" (mou saishou shinai) or "非表示にする" (hishou ni suru).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using "もう表示しない" (mou saishou shinai) or "非表示にする" (hishou ni suru) for a more natural feel.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'නැවත පෙන්වන්න එපා' while technically conveying 'Don't show again,' isn't the most natural or common phrasing in Sinhala for this context. A more idiomatic translation would be something like 'ඉවසන්න එපා' (iwāsanna epā) meaning 'Don't bother' or 'Leave it'. The current translation is quite literal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'ඉවසන්න එපා' (iwāsanna epā) or a similar phrasing that feels more natural in Sinhala for this type of user interface text.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'Nezobrazovať znova' is not the most natural Slovak translation for 'Don't show again.' A more common and idiomatic phrasing would be 'Neukazovať znova' or 'Zrušiť upozornenie'.

The Serbian translation "Не приказуј поново" is a literal translation but doesn't convey the intended meaning of "Don't show again" in a natural way for user interface elements. It sounds somewhat formal and unusual in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural and common translation for a button or option that dismisses a notification or pop-up would be "Не понови" or "Не приказуј више".
